subject: download Creative Suite 3
body:
Evil be to him who evil thinks.

I was never less alone than when by myself.

I'm not into working out. My philosophy: No pain, no pain.

Men are Moved by two levers only: fear and self interest

Our own physical body possesses a wisdom which we who inhabit the body lack. We give it orders which make no sense.

There is little much beyond the grave, but the strong are saying nothing until they see.

Whatever you are, be a good one.

Dance like no one is watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like no one is listening, Live like it's heaven on earth.

Ignorance is like a delicate fruit touch it, and the bloom is gone.

Many people die at twenty five and aren't buried until they are seventy five.

It is better to know nothing than to know what ain't so.

I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.

What's fame? a fancy'd life in other's breath. A thing beyond us, even before our death.
